channel.title: Vistex v5
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2hnx1xj.png[/img]
I am releasing Vistex Version 5. This is a entirely Pk based server. I removed all skills whatsoever. Enjoy kids.
[COLOR=Red][U][B]DOWNLOAD LINKS:[/B][/U][/COLOR]
[URL=http://uppit.com/p6k1w3vl6djb/Release.rar]Package (Contains Both Client & Source)[/URL]
[URL=http://uppit.com/6g14quomx3k2/VistexCacheV1.rar]Cache[/URL] Yes I know the cache says V1 that is because I can not be fucked find the cache and upload it. Just replace the name and it should be working.
[B][U][COLOR=DarkOrchid]* Features *[/COLOR][/U][/B]
*Spawning *Token Economy *PvP Everywhere *Clan Wars Pking *All Specials *All Spells Working 100% *HD Items and Characters *Fully working Overloads *Recover Special Working *Killing Achievements *New Right Clicks *Faster Client Loading *Better Server Stability *100% Ancient Curses *A lot of commands *Perfect Hitsplats *All Weapon Specials 100% *Domination Tower *Perfect Combat *New Items *Perfect Switching *Dicing *Perfect Clan Chat *Money Pouch *Exp Counter *VPS Hosted *24/7 Uptime *KillStreak System *Loyalty Titles *Player Owned Shops
[COLOR=Cyan][U][B]* Media *[/B][/U][/COLOR]
[URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zifx_3AIKmI&feature=plcp]Vistex Spawn Pk Vid[/URL] [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M7yMsduMvEA&feature=plcp]Vistex Hybriding[/URL]
MEDIA [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9JdZ0.gifv[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2yyyxd1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/dgtlzq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IEzGa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aArnw.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://www.habbofansite.net/fontgen/index.php?text=Credits&style=75[/img] Myself Legend/omar Stefano Connor Rune-Server Community
[COLOR="Orange"][U][B][I]*IMPORTANT NOTES*[/I][/B][/U][/COLOR]
*This has a game engine worth $40. *Cache may be missing some sprites *I will not be helping with client fixes.[/QUOTE]
